OPK The 4day market rally has seen the Dow rise by more than 1100 points and the major averages have risen 45 Meanwhile OPK is up 3 pennies or 16 off of decade lows and has 11 consecutive closes under 2 for the first time since 2010 All of this during one of the greatest periods of wealth building in stock market history Its hard to make a case for this to be included in a portfolio even as a speculative investment But what do I know
OPK some normalcy red on a Green Day goo opk
